mapper.select: SELECT * from member where m_id = #{m_id} and m_pw = #{m_pw} and m_wd = 0
SELECT sum(c_count) FROM cart WHERE m_num = #{m_num}
SELECT sum(w_wish) FROM wishlist WHERE m_num = #{m_num} and w_wish = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM oldbook WHERE m_num = #{m_num}
SELECT sum(c.c_count * n.nb_price) totalPrice FROM cart c, newbook n WHERE c.nb_num = n.nb_num and c.m_num = #{m_num}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT c.nb_num, c.c_count, n.nb_title, n.nb_price, n.nb_writer, n.nb_publisher, n.nb_image FROM cart c, newbook n WHERE c.nb_num = n.nb_num and c.m_num = #{m_num}) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT w.nb_num, w.w_wish, n.nb_image, n.nb_title, n.nb_price, n.nb_writer, n.nb_publisher FROM wishlist w, newbook n WHERE w.nb_num = n.nb_num and w.m_num = #{m_num} and w.w_wish = 1) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT q.q_title title, p.m_point point, p.a_par_pdate date1, p.p_list_type type1 FROM point_list p, quiz q WHERE p.q_num = q.q_num AND m_num = #{m_num} UNION SELECT to_char(o.o_order_num) title, p.m_point point, p.a_par_pdate date1, p.p_list_type type1 FROM point_list p, orderr o WHERE p.o_order_num = o.o_order_num AND p.m_num = #{m_num} UNION SELECT a.a_title title, p.m_point date1, p.a_par_pdate point, p.p_list_type type1 FROM point_list p,attendance a WHERE p.a_num = a.a_num AND m_num = #{m_num} ORDER by date1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT n.nb_title, o.ob_grade, o.ob_pur_price, o.ob_sell_price, o.ob_write_date, n.nb_publisher, n.nb_writer, n.nb_image,n.nb_num FROM newbook n, oldbook o WHERE n.nb_num = o.nb_num AND m_num = #{m_num}) a ORDER BY ob_write_date ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
UPDATE member SET m_wd = 1 WHERE m_num = #{m_num}
SELECT FROM member m_pw WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
UPDATE member SET m_pw = #{m_pw} WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
